attributes.action: Make criminalising(killing) the LGBTQ community illegal in all the countries!
attributes.additional_details:
72 countries say being LGBTQ is illegal.
8 countries call upon death to the LGBTQ community.
Same sex marriage is not even considered.
Anyone who is LGBTQ, Whether gay or transgender are punished by both mental and physical means such as rock throwing and threatening calls.
There are so many more problems that are on the internet that provides evidence.
Also it is the 21st century why are we still in the past?
When love is love
attributes.background:
In countries such as Russia being gay or transgender is looked down upon and in 72 countries it’s illegal by either death or imprisonment!
This petition is to try and stop this injustice towards the LGBTQ community. Even if you do not support the LGBTQ community, do you support death?

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament can't change the law in other countries. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to urge the governments of other countries to change their laws and policies.
